DOC.criteria: Inclusion : 1 . Men woman nonchildbearing potential age 18 50 year inclusive screening . 2 . Healthy determine investigator basis screen evaluation . 3 . Nonsmoker smoker few 10 cigarette per day determine history . Exclusion : 1 . No presence history disorder may prevent successful completion study . 2 . No history drug abuse within 1 year .
